summary: New dragon skeleton retexture: The Eldergleam Dragon
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30620/?][b][i][color=red][*]/// Bloody Dragon Bones 1.1 RELEASED! Now compatible with Eldergleam Dragon Bones///[/color][/b][/url][/center]
[center][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130122/gmlsutku.jpg[/img][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130122/k3ip2iot.jpg[/img][youtube]T9s5rY43vzo[/youtube][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130122/s6ngagbb.jpg[/img][/center][line]

[center][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130122/zue5m686.jpg[/img][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130122/qvvscmmf.gif[/img][url=http://s1.directupload.net/images/130123/uu34ptl7.gif][img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130122/jxi96vqe.gif[/img][/url][img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130122/9d9c6hhn.gif[/img][/center][center]///[b][i][color=green]check out [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/192480]these screenshots[/url] and let me know what you think![/color][/i][/b]///[/center][line]
[center][b]other standalone retextures:[/b][/center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28741/][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130128/ifmd8avw.gif[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30620/][img]http://s7.directupload.net/images/130128/sqbq2vcu.gif[/img][/url][line]


[img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/130122/6flj7gjw.jpg[/img]
[b]/// 1.0 RELEASE ///[/b]
[u]NEWS:[/u]
[list][b][i][color=red][*]post your thoughts, screenshots and the ENB you are using[/color] =)[/b][/i]
[*]I am going to redo/optimize the 1k and 2k versions in a future update. I know they need some special treatment, so dont worry!
[*]I need an adequate primary image... do you have one? =)[/list]
Dragon Skeleton info:
old resolution:
[list][*][i]256x256[/i]
new resolutions:
[*][i]1024x1024[/i]
[*][i]2048x2048[/i]
[*][i]4096x4096[/i][/list]



[b][u]UPDATES:[/u][/b]

v1.0:
[list][*]RELEASE[/list]


[img]http://s14.directupload.net/images/130122/ifydfjlu.jpg[/img]
[u]install:[/u]
use NMM to install this mod or just drop the data folder in your main skyrim directory.

[u]uninstall:[/u]
use NMM or remove the 2 files "dragonskeleton.dds" and "dragonskeleton_n.dds" from the following folder:
.../data/textures/actors/dragon/

[u]Compatibility & additional INFO[/u]
This mod should cause no bugs or any kind of CTD. however if you started to experience crashes right after installing this mod, it is because you are running out of GPU memory. in that case use a lower resolution version of this mod =)


[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]
If you like this mod, don't forget to support me =)
[color=red]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]



[center][color=orange]Permissions
You are not allowed to use any textures of this mod whithout my permission!
Do not upload or distribute these files on other sites![/color][/center]
